name.zh: 計算機與程式設計概論

description: Being the most-up-to-date technology in an ever-changing discipline, this course emphasizes an in-depth understanding of why computers are essential in business and society. Students will have a solid understanding of computers and how to use computers. Specifically, students will be taught to understand the fundamentals of and terms associated with computers and mobile devices, the Internet, and digital security.

syllabus.zh:
1. 數位素養
2. 網際網路
3. 電腦與行動裝置
4. 電腦與行動應用程式
5. 數位資安
6. 電腦與行動裝置內部
syllabus.en:
1. Digital Literacy
2. The Internet
3. Computers and Mobile Devices
4. Programs and Apps
5. Digital Safety and Security
6. Inside computers and Mobile Devices

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 能了解電腦系統、網路的基本學理
能應用國際商務軟體處理實務資料
